snippet: Kamil Stoch of Poland won the ski jumping event at the Kuopio Ski Games in Helsinki, Finland, to increase his lead in the overall World Cup standings.
lead_paragraph: Kamil Stoch of Poland won the ski jumping event at the Kuopio Ski Games in Helsinki, Finland, to increase his lead in the overall World Cup standings.

headline.main: Poland’s Stoch Increases World Cup Points Lead
headline.print_headline: Poland’s Stoch Increases World Cup Points Lead
